verses.name: Ezekiel 30:25
verses.text: But I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon, and the arms of Pharaoh shall fall down; and they shall know that I am the Lord, when I shall put my sword into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall stretch it out upon the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:26
verses.text: And I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and disperse them among the countries; and they shall know that I am the Lord.
